name: PIZZA was plentiful and nothing hurt
name_original: PIZZA was plentiful and nothing hurt
description:
You often dream back to those days where getting PIZZA was easy. But that's over now..

Help the Olmec statue raid the PIZZA PALACE and keep it alive on its way back home.

A game about prevailing after disaster has struck. What happens when the ground beneath your feet gives way? Will you still be able to enjoy the PIZZA?

Made for Ludum Dare 46
